content: The composition of municipal solid waste is estimated as follows.

!High level categories are determined from [waste_compo1]. The division of plastic is estimated from [waste_compo2] and for metals and paper from [waste_compo3]. 'Other nonferrous metals' reported by [waste_compo3] are assumed to be copper.

references.author: United States Environmental Protection Agency
references.title: National Overview: Facts and Figures on Materials, Wastes and Recycling

references.author: Aurpa, S. S.
references.title: Characterization of MSW and Plastic Waste Volume Estimation During COVID-19 Pandemic
references.journal: Masters Thesis, University of Texas at Arlington

references.author: Spendlow, P.
references.title: Oregon solid waste characterization and composition study
